Camera is secondary. Degraded myself from galaxy note 4 to this masterpiece.

take the decision  
  
I love the phone  
Big screen  
Good battery life  
Good processer  
Everything is good in this phone

Phone is good in performance and looking .Emui is fine not aatract the user
but some features are good like eye protection and customization in nav keys
and other main features.Come to camera i am disappointed as comparison mia1,
the main reason buy for a dual camera is portrait mode and mia1 gets an
advantage than honor7x but front 📷 is awesome and portrait mode is good in
terms of front camera.. and phone is so big and company also giving a
transparent cover for back protection..but if anyone confused between honor 7x
and mia1 go for 2nd one mia1 sure.

Honor is best brand ....superb mobile.. .everything superb.. Display is top of
the chart.. Camera is too good...processor also good no lag... Looks awesome
2.5d curved glass which is impressive... Best smartphone till date for
me....I'm previously used vivo y66..  
  
Only battery is bad.... Gives 4-5 hours screen play.... I'm cut 1 star for
battery... Charging time is 2. 15 hours... 0 to 100 percent....

Best budget phone with 6 inch large screen. I am using it form last 40 days
and never find any issue.  
Pros:  
Excellent performance, software and build quality.  
Cons:  
The big thing I can miss is android Oreo. It launched in Dec 2017 with Android
N but after few days Honor launched few other phone launched with Android O.  
Battery back up is average which can last up to only one day if you are a
moderate user.  
Brightness is bit low in sun light.

Great phone with the new 18:9 aspect ratio. No lags so far, great screen
resolution, eye pleasing UI skin over android nougat. Fingerprint scanner is
very fast. There was an issue of screen glitching experienced with youtube but
completely curable ( I coordinated with the huawei customer care with live
chat feature on there official website ), I didn't experienced it once I did
all the steps they asked for. Camera wise it is somewhere above average, the
bokah effect need some software tweaks to get better, low light imaging is not
very good, camera has loads of settings and modes to play with. It misses the
fast charging in 16K price range, I guess they can provide that feature as
many companies in this price range are providing that in there phones so one
less star.

One of the best decision in terms of phone. I have waited to buy this phone
since its launch. Missed several opportunities while it went on sale. However
finally succeeded in grabbing it. All praised for its 4GB RAM & excellent
camera quality. A very handy phone which comes with free rubber cover which is
a blessing.

The delivery of this mobile in 3 days as expected from amazon.  
.  
The mobile was very sexy look.  
.  
Out of the box we got 3 gb ram free to use and 1 gb for system and in32 gb
storage we got 21 gb free to use.  
.  
At this prise i love this mobile.  
.  
The full hd display was awesome....the ui is free to use.  
.  
The mobile is awesome buyed a premium mobie at this prise rang I'm satisfied

Touch screen is better than my one plus 3t... Dosplay is good... Phone
features are good specially notebook can be opened while taking a call,
without going back: so one can write something during call very easily. ..
Battery back up is decent... Much better phone than MI and motorola... Looks
like it will be good companion for a long run... No heating issue!! Most
amazingly its looks are very nice and neat... Few people complained that
Youtube app does not work and that is true but youtube is easily accessible
through crome so no hard feeling... I disabled youtube and using crome
instead... Saved data as well, as youtube always neex to be updated while
crome is not so much frequently needed to be updated...

Yeah awesome featured phone but the camera quality is not good as we others
are giving in this amount. Speed is too good but the option of huawei cloud is
just a formality and no update is there and still a major problem no option
for call record if we need something to record we have to download another
package for it that is a little bit trouble please provide a call record
option in the next update because that is needed and if the update is launched
in china then what is the problem in india make tit launch here

Buy this if cameras aren't your highest priority else buy mi a1. So far i am
very happy with honor 7x  
Pros-  
1-Display  
2-performance  
3-rear and front cameras(rear-mi a1, front honor7x) . Sometimes portrait mode
looks artificial so i hope honor gives an ota update to improve portrait mode.  
4-battery life(not as good as redmi note 4 but gets me through the day with
normal or moderate usage)  
5-design(comes down to personal preference)  
  
Cons!  
1-no gyroscope sensor. I don't use vr so i don't have any problems with that  
2-doesn't support wifi @5ghz or wifi ac. Still i have no problems since i have
jio .  
Small features i like in honor 7x  
1- it has iPhone Ike spotlight search which comes in very handy when u have a
lot of apps installed  
2- using fingerprint sensor u can pull down notification panel which could be
very useful since 7x has 5.9" inch screen  
  
Overall a great phone at 13k

Great looks, build quality and finish. Battery last for well over a day even
with moderate usage. Camera is excellent in day light however low light photos
quality in auto mode is not that great. The edge to edge display quality is
excellent, be it for watching 1080p videos or for scrolling through the camera
roll. Overall, it's a great package and a lot of stuff for what you pay.

My experience with the phone has been great up to now. I have been using the
phone for more than a month now without any heating or hanging issues at all.
The display is too good with decent sound quality. The Honor UI is also very
user friendly and has many user friendly features to make your phone usage
experience a delight. I hope this phone would stay the same for at least 2
years. All in all great product from HONOR.

Reviewing after one month use :  
First thanks to honor for its awesome looks and beautiful camera. My friends
who are not aware about honor and only belived in samsung/moto are surprised
after seeing its gorgeous looks and cristal clean camera quality. Pics like
DSLR. Very strong network magnetism. Now smoothly net surfing in regular train
journy is not a problem. Battery stay easily for a full long day. Full charge
in 2hours. FHD disply. And strongly built outer case. Front camera also very
well & takes nice pis even in very low lights. In one month no hanging or
lagging created.  
  
Cons: 1)- **hybrid sim slot is its main problem to me . 2)- No fast charger.
3)- No frontal flash light. 4)- battery is ok for a moderate user but not for
a heavy gamer.  
Overall : its true I am in love with this device. In my advice "brother go for
it"

For 13k it's a beast..  
Full HD display.  
With 5.93 inches display it's perfect..  
Though it have some cons by its kk.

Amazon rocks..

It's been one month since i bought this phone. I really wanted to brake some
myth revolving around this phone.  
1 Low light photography : First of all for this budget honor has provided a
very good camera . Some people who feel that the phone is dull in low light
should change their settings and its a gem.  
2\. Not good for gaming: Honor 7x comes with Mali Gpu which is old but not a
bad one and they often compare with Adreno Gpu . Of course, Adreno is powerful
but Mali is only slightly below par . Reviewers often play Alsphalt Airbone 8
to compare gaming performance which has lot of graphics and eats a RAM. At one
point any budget phone in the market will definitely have some nags when you
play such a high quality game.  
3\. Phone is not corning gorilla : Come on guys 2.5 D glass is same as corning
gorilla which protects your screen from scratch and breakage.  
Pros :  
1 . Extraordinary camera  
2\. Elegant screen display  
3\. Beautiful Design  
4\. Classy blue color  
5\. Smooth EMUI 5.1(Waiting for face unlock in next update EMUI 8.0 Oreo)  
5\. Powerful performance  
6\. Duplicating apps.  
7\. Honor cloud storage  
8\. 3400mAH battery.  
  
Cons :  
1 .Only cons is no fast charging.  
Overall you can go it if you are looking for a long lasting, stylish, budget
easy, better build and full screen display!

Looks and performance is best-in-class. However the EMUI has some bloatware
which is completely avoidable. Infact the UI makes the classy hardware look
cheap in many aspects. Hope Huawei learns the art of clean Android from
OnePlus. Then they'll be the best-in-class by a very large margin.

There are lots of tech heads out there to get you of this product. It's good,

18:9 display.  
7x also outstands in terms of performance... So it's you... Your choice

review:
Since I have purchased this phone (Honor 7), I am making rounds of the service
centres and service provider. Please don"t purchase this phone. I have
purchased this phone on 28th Jan, 2018, not even one month back. The numbers
dialled on the phone (tried with different SIM cards) is not going through to
the right number. Some times I am getting the message that "you are not
authorised to call this number". On certain numbers the call goes through to a
wrong number. On majority of the dialled numbers I am getting the above
message. On a few numbers the calls don't go through and on some the call
lands on a wrong number. However, on a few numbers the calls go through
properly.  
  
K A. Bangera

i am used the honor 7x as genuine 7 days  
two major defects  
first one battery backup not good very fast discharging  
second one after the system update camera quality very poor(because i used two

I'm using this phone since a month. Some Pros and Cons I observed...  
  
PROS -  
1\. Great Camera! I compared it with one plus 5, iPhone 7plus, and if not
better, it gives quite comparable results. Also, with loads of camera features
it stands tall compared to all mid range phones.  
  
2\. Awesome looks,display and build quality.  
  
3\. With the gyroscope update, the phone feels even more premium as you can
enjoy 360 degree videos. Good for VR lovers.  
  
4\. In the power saving mode, it can fully charge the phone under 3 hours.  
  
CONS -  
1\. The only reason I'm not rating it as 5 star is because of its performance
lag at times. It doesn't hangs but takes more time to open an app. That's very
rare but I think honor should fix this issue with its update.

Im using honor 7x since 8th January.Honor 7x is a good phone in the price
range.but company should work more on the bokeh mode(sometimes pictures look
artificial).  
It got many options in its camera section. And are useful.apart from this the
phone is very fluid  
UI is good.it is about to get the oreo(8) update and face recognition.I got an
update(EMUI) on 14th january and since then gyroscope is working.battery is
average(one day).videos playback and sound is good enough.

review:
Awesome phone. Have been using huawei P8 lite for a long time. But honor 7 x
feels light in the hands and amazingly fast. But internal memory is very low
in the 32 gb variant. I should have gotten the 64 gb product.

The phone is just awesome . The performance of honour is great. Look wise and
price wise it is better than mi A1 and yaa performance by too. The
disappointing thing is that it take. 1hrs 30-40min to charge completely from
15%. But it last for a day. But if u are a heavy user then you have to charge
it again. So overall the phone is very well . People doesn't like it by camera
wise but.... Trust me it takes superb pics but front is little disappointing
in dark but in light it also.....takes such a cool Nd beautiful pics . Soo go
ahead and buy this without any hesitation...

Awesome phone  
Just rear dual camera doesn't work very well and bokeh effect looks
bad(background blur don't work nicely) and gyroscope absent  
Some features will come with ota update like face unlock but till then wait  
Other than those it has everything perfect  
Best thing is the performance and display with more than average battery
backup.

The phone is amazing. As some users said the flickering screen i too have
faced it for one time. Thats what made me dissappoint but with an software
update it went away.  
The camera is good but rear potrait mode, dual camera are nof satisfactory.
Overall i liked the phone. The battery back is okk eith me.

Great Phone despite a few flaws like the artificial bokeh effect (wide
aperture mode). The recent update enabled the Gyroscope sensor so now you can
enjoy VR content.  
  
A beautiful infinity display with dual camera setup and decent performance at
that price is pretty sweet.

This phone looks absolutely stunning! Does everything right and then some. I
loved the feature loaded camera too. I'm upgrading from my 4 year old Moto G,
so maybe my expectations weren't too high and the 7x has definitely surpassed
them. I'd be very happy if this phone turns out to be even half as durable as
my Moto G.

very good phone with awsome look .. go for this..i have bought this phone in
21 dec 2017. before purchasing this phone i have only two negative review .1.
slow charging .... but i have honor 6 charger from which i can charge it from
0 to 100 in 1:20 min max. 2.Gyroscoe but this is not a major issue. overall
very good phone

Best option at this range with top notch performance. However rear cameras are
not upto mi A1 but front camera is way far better than mi A1. Most attraction
point is the bezeless display itself. With decent battery backup also heating
is less while compared to miA1.Speakers are pretty good.finger print sensor
works just fine. Comes with a jelly case so no problems while attaching
temperd glass.  
In this range i would recommend 7x than any other phone at this price.  
  
Ps:this is my opinion what i felt no offense

Good and decent phone for the price with the latest features . A 18:9 ratio
display pritty good . But not water proof . Though it's not not water proof
atlest for the price it must at least have a water resistant feature . Camer
is quite decent . But the camer features 16+2 Mp at the back why not at least
16+5or8mp . Even at the front the selfi camer a it's pritty good but the front
flash is missing. Though all this problem it's a good choice for those who are
searching for a mid-range phone with a good processor

Great Buy !  
  
No heating , Good Multi Tasking , Better Camera after last update . Good Ram
Management . Build quality great ! Cover provided with phone fits well. 16k
nearly for 64 gb is not value for money anyway.

review:
It's a OK type cellphone not great. User interface could have been better what
I felt after using lenovoK3 K3 note for 3 years before using it. Camera is
also OK type and not great. Lot of issues I am facing regarding jio vedio call
which is not yet sorted. Also after connecting to laptop for some reasons data
can't be transferred from one to other.. May be some options may be there
which I could not find... With lenovoK3 all automatically used to happen. For
some one like me who is not very good in all these it's tough to operate.....

Phone is awesome, gyroscope cencer is available in new update, but audio
quality is not up to the mark coz i m using skull candy n the sound quality is
not up to the mark otherwise itzz awesome in this price range

This phone is awesome.Perfect i every manner.  
Very much impressed by its performance and looks.  
I have used it more than a week so i can present my views on it.  
Performance-9/10  
Camera-8/10  
Ram Management-9/10  
Looks-9/10  
Battery-9/10  
Overall-9/10  
Main point is it didnt lag any where smooth control and interface.  
4GB RAM makes Gaming awesome  
But still you are confused with MI A1 then you should go with this phone it
will not let you down.

Decent look with display but camera out put not ok as mentioned by Honor. Well

Nice product.... Worth mobile... Nice camera quality.. Feeling awesome....
